<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-3.B.1
<SEQUENCE>2
<FILENAME>x3b1.htm
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE> </TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#ffffff" style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>




<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><b><font size=2>Exhibit 3(b)1</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>ARTICLES OF AMENDMENT</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>to the</font></b></p>>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>of</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>ALABAMA POWER COMPANY</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.48in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Pursuant to, and with the effect provided in, Sections 10-2B-10.03 through 10-2B-10.06 of the </font><u><font size=2>Code of Alabama, 1975</font></u><font size=2>, as amended (the "Code"), the undersigned company adopts the following Articles of Amendment to its Articles of Incorporation:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="635" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:129.6%'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font SIZE=2>FIRST:</font></p> </td>
        <td width="491" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The name of the company is "Alabama Power Company" (the "Company").</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.48in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>SECOND:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;An amendment be made in the joint agreement between Alabama Power Company and Birmingham Electric Company prescribing the terms and conditions of the merger of Birmingham Electric Company into and with Alabama Power Company, as heretofore amended, providing for, the increase of capital stock of the Company by 15,000,000 shares of common stock by amending the first paragraph of Article IX of such joint agreement to read as follows, which was duly adopted in the manner provided by the Code by the Company's Board of Directors and shareholders at a meeting held on April 25, 2008:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>&#147;Article IX</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:center;'><b><font size=2>Capital Stock</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>The corporation is authorized to issue four classes of shares of capital stock to be designated, respectively, &#147;common stock,&#148; &#147;preferred stock,&#148; &#147;Class A preferred stock&#148; and &#147;preference stock.&#148;  The total number of shares of stock which the corporation shall have authority to issue shall be 111,350,000 shares, of which 40,000,000 shares shall be common stock with a par value of $40 per share, 3,850,000 shares shall be preferred stock with a par value of $100 per share, 27,500,000 shares shall be Class A preferred stock with a par value of $1 per share and 40,000,000 shares shall be preference stock with a par value of $1 per share.  The designations, preferences, voting powers or restrictions or qualifications thereof, the rights of redemption, retirement and conversion of the shares of capital stock of the corporation, and the general provisions
with respect thereto, shall be as hereinafter set forth; provided, however, that the preferred stock, Class A preferred stock and preference stock may be divided into and </font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>issued from time to time in one or more series, each such series of preferred stock or Class A preferred stock being hereinafter for convenience referred to as a &#147;class&#148; of preferred stock or Class A preferred stock, as the case may be, all such series of preferred stock or Class A preferred stock being hereinafter for convenience collectively referred to as &#147;classes&#148; of preferred stock or Class A preferred stock, as the case may be, and each such series of preference stock shall be referred to as a &#147;series,&#148; of preference stock.   The board of directors shall have, and is hereby granted the power and authority to divide the unissued shares of preferred stock, Class A preferred stock and preference stock into series (including the power and authority to reclassify, in the manner provided by law, all or any number of the unissued shares of preferred stock
authorized at the time of the adoption of the joint agreement between Alabama Power Company and Birmingham Electric Company prescribing the terms and conditions of the merger of Birmingham Electric Company into and with Alabama Power Company), to fix and determine the following relative rights and preferences of any such series of preferred stock and Class A preferred stock, and the number of shares constituting any such series and the designation thereof, or any of them: (1) the dividend rate, (2) the dividend payment dates, (3) the redemption price thereof, (4) the amount payable in event of liquidation, voluntary and involuntary and (5) the sinking fund provisions, if any, for the redemption or purchase of shares; to fix and determine the following relative rights and preferences of any such series of preference stock, and the number of shares constituting any such series and the designation thereof, or any of them: (1) the dividend rate, (2) the dividend payment dates, (3) the
dividend rights, including the cumulative or non-cumulative nature thereof,  (4) the terms and conditions for redemption of shares and the redemption price thereof, (5) the amount payable in event of liquidation, voluntary and involuntary, (6) the sinking fund provisions, if any, for the redemption or purchase of shares and (7) special voting rights, if any; and to increase or decrease the number of shares of any such series subsequent to the issue of shares of that series, but not below the number of shares of such series then outstanding.  In case the number of shares of any series shall be so decreased, the shares constituting such decrease shall assume the status of authorized but unissued shares of preferred stock, Class A preferred stock or preference stock, as the case may be.  The board of directors may issue and sell such shares of preferred stock, Class A preferred stock or preference stock in series and any other authorized shares provided for in this Article IX.  Upon the
issuance of shares of Class A preferred stock and preference stock, there shall be transferred to stated capital represented by each such share of Class A preferred stock or preference stock, as the case may be, an amount equal to the excess of the consideration </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>2</font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>received over the par value thereof (up to an amount which, when added to such par value, shall not exceed such share's preferential claim in the event of involuntary liquidation) and the stated capital represented by each share so determined shall be equal to such share's preferential claim in the event of involuntary liquidation.&#148;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:-1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.49in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>THIRD:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The proposed amendment to the general provisions of capital stock require the affirmative vote of the holders of the larger amount in total value of all of the capital stock of the Company.  The Company considers that the favorable vote of the holders of all of the outstanding common stock will be sufficient for the adoption of such amendment.  </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.48in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>FOURTH:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;At the close of business on March 10, 2008, the record date, the Company had 21,725,000 shares of common stock issued and outstanding, 475,115 shares of preferred stock, par value $100 per share, issued and outstanding and 12,000,000 shares of Class A preferred stock, par value $1 per share, issued and outstanding. All of the 21,725,000 shares of common stock voted affirmatively for the adoption of the amendment</font><b><font size=2>.  </font></b><font size=2>Of the total shares of preferred stock issued and outstanding, no shares voted affirmatively for the adoption of the amendment, no shares voted against the amendment and no shares abstained, and of the total shares of Class A preferred stock issued and outstanding, no shares voted affirmatively for the adoption of the amendment, no shares voted against the amendment and no shares
abstained, such affirmative votes being sufficient for the adoption of the foregoing amendment.</font><u><b><font size=2> </font></b></u><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>3</font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'>
<font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned officers of the Company, do hereby set their hand and the seal of the Company on the 25<sup>th</sup> day of April, 2008. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:3.5in;text-align:justify;'><font SIZE=2>ALABAMA POWER COMPANY</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><b><font size=2>Exhibit 10(d)1</font></b></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN FOR</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B><font SIZE=2>OUTSIDE DIRECTORS OF GULF POWER COMPANY</font></B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>Amended and Restated Effective January 1, 2008</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=3><b>SECTION 1</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Purpose and Adoption of Plan</font></u></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.1</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Adoption</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Gulf Power Company previously established the Deferred Compensation Plan for Directors of Gulf Power Company.  The Plan was last amended and restated effective January 1, 2000.  The Plan has been amended from time to time including this good faith amendment and restatement effective January 1, 2008 to comply with Code Section 409A.  Except as otherwise provided herein and consistent with Sections 1.2 and 1.3, the terms of the Plan as in effect prior to the effective date of this Plan shall continue to be applicable to deferrals made pursuant to the Plan prior to January 1, 2008.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.2</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Pre-2005 Deferrals</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Compensation paid to Directors and deferred under the Plan prior to January 1, 2005 shall be treated by the Company as not subject to Section 409A of the Code and therefore &#147;grandfathered.&#148;  The Account balance (plus earnings thereon) of the &#147;grandfathered&#148; deferrals shall only be subject to the provisions of the Plan in effect prior to January 1, 2005 as set forth in the Schedule of Provisions for Pre-2005 Deferrals attached hereto.  In accordance with transition rules under Section 409A of the Code, Internal Revenue Service Notice 2005-1, and any other applicable guidance from the Department of Treasury, the provisions of the prior Plan are only intended to preserve the rights and features of the &#147;grandfathered&#148; deferrals and are, therefore, not intended to be &#147;materially modified&#148; with respect to any aspect of such rights and features.
Provisions of the prior Plan should be so construed whenever necessary or appropriate.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.3</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>409A Good Faith Period</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>For the period from January 1, 2005 to December 31, 2008, the Plan shall be administered in good faith compliance with Section 409A of the Code.  At a time and in a manner determined by the Committee, Directors shall make timely elections to conform to the Plan&#146;s terms effective on and after January 1, 2008.    Such elections shall be made prior to January 1, 2008 and shall apply to elections to defer Cash Compensation and/or Stock Retainer subject to Section 409A of the Code on and after January 1, 2005.  In particular, such elections shall establish the form and timing of commencement of distribution of amounts in Deferred Compensation Accounts pursuant to a new Distribution Election.  Such elections are intended to meet the transition requirements of Section 409A of the Code, Internal Revenue Service Notice 2005-1 and other related guidance promulgated by the Department of Treasury.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=3><b>SECTION 2</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Definitions</font></u></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.1</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Beneficial Ownership</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means beneficial ownership within the meaning of Rule 13d-3 promulgated under the Exchange Act.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.2</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Board</font></u><font size=2>&#148; or &#147;</font><u><font size=2>Board of Directors</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Board of Directors of the Company.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.3</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Business Combination</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means a reorganization, merger or consolidation or sale of Southern with another corporation or an entity treated as a corporation for United States federal income tax purposes.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.4</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Cash Compensation</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the annual retainer fees and meeting fees payable to a Director in cash.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.5</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Code</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, or any successor statute.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.6</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Committee</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Compensation Committee and Executive Committees of the Board, or such other committee as may be designated by the Board to be responsible for administering the Plan.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.7</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Common Stock</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the common stock of Southern including any shares into which it may be split, subdivided, or combined.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.8</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Company</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means Gulf Power Company, or any successor thereto.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.9</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Company Change in Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the following: </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership of 50% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of the Company; provided, however, that for purposes of this Section 2.9, any acquisition by an Employee, or Group composed entirely of Employees, any qualified pension plan, any publicly held mutual fund or any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation Controlled by Southern shall not constitute a Change in Control;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(b)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Consummation of a reorganization, merger or consolidation of the Company (a &#147;Company Business Combination&#148;), in each case, unless, following such Company Business Combination, Southern Controls the corporation surviving or resulting from such Company Business Combination; or </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(c)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Consummation of the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity which Southern does not Control.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.10</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Compensation Payment Date</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the date on which compensation, including Cash Compensation, and the Stock Retainer, is payable to a Director or compensation which would otherwise be payable to a Director if an election to defer such compensation had not been made.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.11</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Consummation</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the completion of the final act necessary to complete a transaction as a matter of law, including, but not limited to, any required approvals by the corporation&#146;s shareholders and board of directors, the transfer of legal and beneficial title to securities or assets and the final approval of the transaction by any applicable domestic or foreign governments or agencies.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>2</font></p>

<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.12</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means, in the case of a corporation, Beneficial Ownership of more than 50% of the combined voting power of the corporation&#146;s Voting Securities, or in the case of any other entity, Beneficial Ownership of more than 50% of such entity&#146;s voting equity interests.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Deferred Cash Trust</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Deferred Cash Compensation Trust for Directors of The Southern Company and its Subsidiaries.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Deferred Compensation Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Prime Rate Investment Account, the Phantom Stock Investment Account, the Deferred Stock Account and/or the Stock Dividend Investment Account.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Deferred Stock Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the bookkeeping account established under Section 7.3 on behalf of a Director and includes shares of Common Stock credited thereto to reflect the reinvestment of dividends pursuant to Section 7.3(a)(iii).</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Funding Change in Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means any of the following: </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>

        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership (during the 12-month period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person) of 35% or more of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities; provided, however, that for purposes of this subsection (a), the following acquisitions of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control: </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="413" style='border-collapse:collapse'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition directly from Southern,</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

    <tr >
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition by Southern,</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation controlled by Southern, </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>3</font></p>

<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="629" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(iv)</font></p> </td>
        <td width="485" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition by a qualified pension plan or publicly held mutual fund,</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by an employee of Southern or its subsidiary or affiliate, or Group composed exclusively of such employees, or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any Business Combination which would not otherwise constitute a Funding Change in Control because of the application of clauses (i), (ii) and (iii) of this Section 2.22(a); </font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(b)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The date a majority of members of the Southern Board is replaced during any 12-month period by directors whose appointment or election is not endorsed by a majority of the members of the Southern Board before the date of the appointment or election; </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(c)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The Consummation of a Business Combination, unless, following such Business Combination, all of the following three conditions are met: </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all or substantially all of the individuals and entities who held Beneficial Ownership, respectively, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities immediately prior to such Business Combination beneficially own, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the combined voting power of the Voting Securities of the corporation surviving or resulting from such Business Combination, (including, without limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction holds Beneficial Ownership of all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities or all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s assets) (such surviving or resulting corporation to be referred to as &#147;Surviving Company&#148;), in substantially the same proportions as their ownership, immediately prior to such Business Combination, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no Person (excluding any corporation resulting from such Business Combination, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund, Group composed exclusively of employees or employee benefit plan (or related trust) of Southern, its subsidiaries or Surviving Company) holds Beneficial Ownership, directly or indirectly, of 35% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of Surviving Company except to the extent that such ownership existed prior to the Business Combination; and </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the majority of the members of the board of directors of Surviving Company during the 12-month period following the Business Combination were members of the Southern Board of Directors at the earlier of the date of execution of the initial agreement, or of the action of the Southern Board of Directors, providing for such Business Combination or such members of the board of directors of the Surviving Company are directors whose appointment or election was endorsed by a majority of the members of such Southern Board of Directors.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(d)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership (during the 12-month period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person) of 50% or more of the combined voting power of the then </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>4</font></p>

<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>outstanding Voting Securities of the Company; provided, however, that for purposes of this Subsection 2.22(d), any acquisition by an employee of Southern or its subsidiary or affiliate, or Group composed entirely of such employees, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund or any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation Controlled by Southern shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control;</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(e)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The Consummation of a reorganization, merger or consolidation of the Company with another corporation (a &#147;Funding Subsidiary Business Combination&#148;), in each case, unless, following such Funding Subsidiary Business Combination, Southern Controls the corporation surviving or resulting from such Funding Subsidiary Business Combination, or</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(f)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The Consummation of the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity that Southern does not Control; provided, however, that for purposes of this subsection (f) the following sales or dispositions otherwise described herein shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control: </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to Southern or to a shareholder of Southern in exchange for or with respect to such shareholder&#146;s stock of Southern; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale of other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to a Person that owns, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the total value or voting power of the outstanding stock of Southern; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity Controlled by shareholders of Southern that hold, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the total value or voting power of all of the outstanding stock of Southern. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>For purposes of this Section 2.22(f) &#147;all or substantially all of the assets&#148; means at least 80% of the gross value of the assets of the entity immediately before the acquisition.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Funding Event</font></u><font size=2>&#148; shall mean the occurrence of any of the following events as administratively determined by the Southern Committee:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Southern or the Company has entered into a written agreement, such as, but not limited to, a letter of intent, which, if Consummated, would result in a Funding Change in Control;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(b)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Southern, the Company or any other Person publicly announces an intention to take or to consider taking actions which, if Consummated, would result in a Funding Change in Control under circumstances where the Consummation of the announced action or intended action is legally and financially possible;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Incumbent Board</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means those individuals who constitute the Southern board of directors as of January 1, 2008, plus any individual who shall become a director subsequent to such date whose election or nomination for election by Southern&#146;s shareholders was approved by a vote of at least 75% of the directors then comprising the Incumbent Board. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no individual who shall become a director of the Southern board of directors subsequent to January 1, 2008, whose initial assumption of office occurs as a result of an actual or threatened election contest (within the meaning of Rule 14a-11 of the regulations promulgated under the Exchange Act) with respect to the election or removal of directors or other actual or threatened solicitation of
proxies or consents by or on behalf of a Person other than the Southern board of directors shall be a member of the Incumbent Board.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Market Value</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the average of the high and low prices of the Common Stock, as published in the Wall Street Journal in its report of New York Stock Exchange composite transactions, on the date such Market Value is to be determined, as specified herein (or the average of the high and low sale prices on the trading day immediately preceding such date if the Common Stock is not traded on the New York Stock Exchange on such date).</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Modification Delay</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means that the election shall not take effect until twelve (12) months after the date the election is made, the payment which is the subject of the election shall be deferred five (5) years from the date previously elected by the Director, and where applicable in the case of a payment made pursuant to a fixed schedule or specified time, the election must be made at least twelve (12) months prior to the time payment is scheduled to be made.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

</div>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Participating Companies</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means those companies that are affiliated with Southern whose boards of directors have authorized the establishment of trust(s) for the funding of their respective directors&#146; Deferred Compensation Accounts under their respective Deferred Compensation Plans for Directors, including the Company.  </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.35&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Preliminary Change in Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the occurrence of any of the following as determined by the Southern Committee:</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Southern or the Company has entered into a written agreement, such as, but not limited to, a letter of intent, which, if Consummated, would result in a Southern Change in Control or a Company Change in Control, as the case may be;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(b)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Southern, the Company or any Person publicly announces an intention to take or to consider taking actions which, if Consummated, would result in a Southern Change in Control or a Company Change in Control under circumstances where the Consummation of the announced action or intended action is legally and financially possible;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Any Person becomes the Beneficial Owner of fifteen percent (15%) or more of the Common Stock; or</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The Southern Board of Directors or the Board of Directors of the Company has declared that a Preliminary Change in Control has occurred.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.36</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Prime Interest Rate</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the prime rate of interest as published in the </font><u><font size=2>Wall Street Journal</font></u><font size=2> or its successor on the 1<sup>st</sup> day of the quarter.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.37</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Prime Rate Investment Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the bookkeeping account established pursuant to Section 7.1 in which a Director may elect to defer Cash Compensation or make investments, the investment return on which is computed at the Prime Interest Rate.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.38</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Separation from Service</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means a ceasing of the obligation to provide service as a Director.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.39</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Southern</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means Southern Company.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Southern Board</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Board of Directors of Southern.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >

        <td style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Southern Change in Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means any of the following:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership of 20% or more of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities; provided, however, that for </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>7</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>purposes of this subsection (a), the following acquisitions of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities shall not constitute a Change in Control: </font></p>


<div align=left>

    <tr >
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>

        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(i)</font></p> </td>
        <td width="269" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition directly from Southern,</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

    <tr >
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>

        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(ii)</font></p> </td>
        <td width="269" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition by Southern,</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation controlled by Southern,  </font></p>


<div align=left>

    <tr >
        <td width="96" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>

        <td width="485" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition by a qualified pension plan or publicly held mutual fund,</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by an Employee or Group composed exclusively of Employees, or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any Business Combination which would not otherwise constitute a Change in Control because of the application of clauses (i), (ii) and (iii) of Section 2.41(a) of this Plan; </font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>

        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>A change in the composition of Southern&#146;s board of directors whereby individuals who constitute the Incumbent Board cease for any reason to constitute at least a majority of Southern&#146;s board of directors; or</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(c)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Consummation of a Business Combination, unless, following such Business Combination, all of the following three conditions are met: </font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all or substantially all of the individuals and entities who held Beneficial Ownership, respectively, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities immediately prior to such Business Combination beneficially own, directly or indirectly, 65% or more of the combined voting power of the Voting Securities of the corporation surviving or resulting from such Business Combination, (including, without limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction holds Beneficial Ownership of all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities or all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s assets) (such surviving or resulting corporation to be referred to as &#147;Surviving Company&#148;), in substantially the same proportions as their ownership, immediately prior to such Business Combination, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no Person (excluding any corporation resulting from such Business Combination, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund, Group composed exclusively of employees or employee benefit plan (or related trust) of Southern, its subsidiaries, or Surviving Company) holds Beneficial Ownership, directly or indirectly, of 20% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of Surviving Company except to the extent that such ownership existed prior to the Business Combination; and </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;at least a majority of the members of the board of directors of Surviving Company were members of the Incumbent Board at the earlier of the date of </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>8</font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>execution of the initial agreement, or of the action of the Southern board of directors, providing for such Business Combination.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.42</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Southern Committee</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means a committee comprised of the Chairman of the Southern Board, the Chief Financial Officer of Southern and the General Counsel of Southern.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.43</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Stock Dividend Investment Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the bookkeeping account(s) established pursuant to Section 7.4 on behalf of a Director that is credited with shares of stock, other than Common Stock, paid as a dividend to holders of record on shares of Common Stock.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.44</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Stock Retainer</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the annual Board retainer fee that is paid to the Director in the form of Common Stock.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.45</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Transferred Amount</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means an amount (a)&nbsp;equal to the value of a Director&#146;s accounts under the applicable deferred compensation plan for directors of Southern, Alabama Power Company, Georgia Power Company, or Mississippi Power Company and (b)&nbsp;which has been transferred to the Plan in connection with the Director&#146;s transfer from the Southern Board or the board of directors of Alabama Power Company, Georgia Power Company, or Mississippi Power Company.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.46</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Trust Administrator</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the individual or committee that is established in the Deferred Stock Trust and the Deferred Cash Trust, to administer such trusts on behalf of the Participating Companies.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.47</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Voting Securities</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the outstanding voting securities of a corporation entitling the holder thereof to vote generally in the election of such corporation&#146;s directors.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>


<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Where the context requires, words in the masculine gender shall include the feminine gender, words in the singular shall include the plural, and words in the plural shall include the singular.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=3><b>SECTION 3</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Purpose</font></u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>The Plan provides Directors with an opportunity to defer compensation paid to them on and after January 1, 2008 until a date following their Separation from Service as a member of the Board.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=3><b>SECTION 4</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Eligibility</font></u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>An individual who serves as a Director and is not otherwise actively employed by the Company or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates is eligible to participate in the Plan.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>9</font></p>
<!-- EEDocs PBStart-->
<p style='page-break-before:always'></p><PAGE>
<!-- EEDocs PBEnd-->

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=3><b>SECTION 5</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Plan Periods</font></u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Except as pertains to a Director&#146;s initial Plan Period, all Plan Periods shall be on a calendar year basis.  The initial Plan Period applicable to any person elected to the Board who was not a Director on the preceding December 31, shall begin on the first day of the quarter next following the effective date of the Director&#146;s election to the Board where timing permits the transfer of Director compensation data for purposes of administration of an initial deferral election under this Section 5.  Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, the initial Plan Period under this amended and restated Plan for Directors serving as of the Effective Date shall begin January 1, 2008.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=3><b>SECTION 6</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Elections</font></u></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>6.1</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Cash Compensation</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(a)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>Prior to the beginning of a Plan Period, a Director may direct that payment of all or any portion of Cash Compensation that otherwise would be paid to the Director for the Plan Period, be deferred in amounts as designated by the Director, and credited to (i) a Prime Rate Investment Account, (ii) a Phantom Stock Investment Account, or (iii) a Deferred Stock Account.  With respect to a Director&#146;s initial Plan Period, such direction to defer shall be made in a timely manner prior to the commencement of the Plan Period in accordance with requirements established by the Committee consistent with Section 5.  Upon the Director&#146;s Separation from Service from the Board of Directors, such deferred compensation and accumulated investment return held in the Director&#146;s Deferred Compensation Accounts shall be distributed to
the Director in accordance with the Director&#146;s Distribution Election and the provisions of Section 8.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%" style='margin-left:0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
 <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(b)</font></p> </td>
        <td  valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in'>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;An election to defer Cash Compensation is irrevocable for a Plan Period.  Such an election shall continue from Plan Period to Plan Period unless the Director changes his election to defer Cash Compensation payable in a future Plan Period prior to the beginning of such future Plan Period.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>
